creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: cone-shaped top; long tail at back extending to a point; embroidered on dark brown with geometric designs in red, yellow, orange, green and blue; embellished with buttons (predominately white), coins, predominately red and white beads; lined with red polka-dotted fabric
title: Child's cap
